title: Daifugou no Kekkon no Jouken
sinopse:
In the Daifugou no Kekkon no Jouken series:

1. Nemurenu Yoru no Jounetsu (The Italian's Deal for I Do) [Story: Jennifer Hayward]
2. Adonis no Tsumetai Houyou (The Greek's Pregnant Bride) [Story: Michelle Smart]
3. Okuman Chouja no Tsuma no Nedan (The Sicilian's Surprise Wife) [Story: Tara Pammi]
4. Takaou to Junketsu no Odoriko (The Sheikh's Wedding Contract) [Story: Andie Brock]
